faqs.question: What does Zerodha do?
faqs.answer: Zerodha is India's largest stock broker offering discount brokerage services. We provide platforms for trading stocks, F&O, commodities, currencies, and investing in mutual funds. Our main products are Kite (trading platform), Coin (mutual funds), Console (back-office), Kite Connect (APIs), and Varsity (education).

faqs.question: Who is Zerodha for?
faqs.answer: Zerodha is for anyone interested in trading or investing in Indian markets. This includes retail traders, long-term investors, mutual fund investors, algo traders, fintech companies building trading applications, and beginners learning about markets through Varsity.

faqs.question: How do I open an account with Zerodha?
faqs.answer: You can open a Zerodha account completely online in under 15 minutes. Visit zerodha.com, click on 'Sign up', provide your PAN, Aadhaar, bank details, and complete the video KYC. Account opening is free for online accounts. Once approved, you can start trading immediately.

faqs.question: What documents do I need to open an account?
faqs.answer: You need a valid PAN card, Aadhaar card, bank account details, and a cancelled cheque or bank statement. You'll also need to complete a video KYC verification. The entire process is paperless and can be done from your phone or computer.

faqs.question: What are your brokerage charges?
faqs.answer: Zerodha offers flat pricing: Zero brokerage on equity delivery trades, and flat ₹20 per executed order for intraday and F&O trades (or 0.03%, whichever is lower). Mutual fund investments through Coin are completely free with zero commission. There are no hidden charges.

faqs.question: Do you have a free tier or trial?
faqs.answer: Account opening is free, and there's no minimum balance requirement to start trading. You can open an account without any upfront cost. The annual maintenance charge is ₹300 per year, which is waived if your turnover exceeds ₹1 lakh. Equity delivery trades are completely free with zero brokerage.

faqs.question: What is the account maintenance charge?
faqs.answer: The annual maintenance charge (AMC) is ₹300 per year. However, this is waived if your annual turnover exceeds ₹1 lakh. The AMC covers access to all Zerodha platforms including Kite, Coin, and Console.

faqs.question: What is Kite?
faqs.answer: Kite is Zerodha's flagship trading platform available on web, mobile, and desktop. It offers lightning-fast order execution, advanced charting with 100+ indicators, multiple order types, market depth, and a clean, intuitive interface. You can trade stocks, F&O, commodities, and currencies all from one platform.

faqs.question: What is Coin?
faqs.answer: Coin is Zerodha's mutual fund investment platform. It allows you to invest in 3000+ direct mutual funds with zero commission. Unlike regular mutual funds, direct plans have lower expense ratios, which means higher returns for you. All investments are held in your demat account, giving you complete control.

faqs.question: What is Kite Connect?
faqs.answer: Kite Connect is our set of REST-like HTTP APIs for trading and market data. It's designed for developers, algo traders, and fintech companies who want to build trading applications or automate their strategies. The API subscription costs ₹2000 per month with unlimited API calls.

faqs.question: What is Varsity?
faqs.answer: Varsity is Zerodha's free educational initiative with comprehensive modules on trading, technical analysis, fundamental analysis, personal finance, and more. It's designed for beginners and experienced traders alike. All content is free and available on web and mobile app.

faqs.question: What can I trade on Zerodha?
faqs.answer: You can trade equity (stocks), equity derivatives (futures and options), currency derivatives, commodity derivatives, government securities, and mutual funds. We provide access to NSE, BSE, MCX, and other major Indian exchanges.

faqs.question: Can I do intraday trading?
faqs.answer: Yes, Zerodha fully supports intraday trading across equity, F&O, currency, and commodity segments. Intraday trades are charged a flat ₹20 per executed order (or 0.03%, whichever is lower). Kite provides all the tools you need including advanced charts, market depth, and fast order execution.

faqs.question: Do you support algorithmic trading?
faqs.answer: Yes, through Kite Connect APIs. You can build and deploy algorithmic trading strategies using our APIs. The API subscription is ₹2000 per month with unlimited calls. We support popular programming languages like Python, Java, and JavaScript with official client libraries.

faqs.question: What kind of customer support do you provide?
faqs.answer: We offer 24/7 customer support through multiple channels: phone support, email, live chat, and an extensive support portal with articles and videos. We also have a very active community forum where traders help each other. Average response time is under 2 minutes during market hours.

faqs.question: Is my money safe with Zerodha?
faqs.answer: Yes, Zerodha is a SEBI-registered stockbroker and member of NSE, BSE, and MCX. Your funds are held in segregated bank accounts, and securities are held in your demat account. We follow all regulatory guidelines and have robust security measures including 2FA, encryption, and regular audits.

faqs.question: What are the platform requirements?
faqs.answer: Kite works on any modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge). The mobile app is available for iOS and Android. Kite desktop app is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux. There are no special hardware requirements - even a basic smartphone or computer works perfectly.

faqs.question: I'm a beginner. Can I use Zerodha?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Zerodha is perfect for beginners. Start by learning through Varsity (our free educational platform), then open an account and start with small investments. You can begin with equity delivery (zero brokerage) or mutual funds through Coin. Our support team is always available to help you.

faqs.question: I'm a developer. How can I use Zerodha?
faqs.answer: As a developer, you can use Kite Connect APIs to build trading applications, backtest strategies, automate trades, or integrate trading into your existing systems. We provide official libraries for Python, Java, JavaScript, and comprehensive documentation. The API costs ₹2000/month with unlimited calls.

faqs.question: Can I use Zerodha for long-term investing?
faqs.answer: Yes, Zerodha is excellent for long-term investing. Equity delivery trades have zero brokerage, making it cost-effective for buy-and-hold strategies. You can also invest in mutual funds through Coin with zero commission. Use Console to track your portfolio and generate tax reports.

faqs.question: Do you offer institutional or corporate accounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support institutional clients, proprietary trading firms, and corporate accounts. For institutional services, please reach out to our business team. We can discuss custom solutions, API access, and volume-based arrangements.

faqs.question: Can I white-label your platform?
faqs.answer: We don't offer white-labeling, but you can build your own branded trading application using Kite Connect APIs. Many fintech companies and brokers use our APIs to power their platforms. Contact our business team to discuss partnership opportunities.

faqs.question: How is Zerodha different from traditional brokers?
faqs.answer: Unlike traditional brokers who charge percentage-based brokerage, Zerodha offers flat pricing - ₹20 per order regardless of trade size. We have zero brokerage on equity delivery. There are no hidden charges, advisory fees, or call-and-trade charges. Everything is transparent and technology-driven.

faqs.question: How quickly can I start trading?
faqs.answer: You can open an account in under 15 minutes online. Once your account is approved (usually within 24 hours), you can transfer funds and start trading immediately. The entire process from signup to first trade typically takes 1-2 days.

faqs.question: How are Coin mutual funds different?
faqs.answer: Coin offers direct mutual funds, which have lower expense ratios compared to regular plans (typically 0.5-1% lower). This means higher returns for you. All funds are held in your demat account, giving you complete ownership. There's zero commission - we don't earn anything from your mutual fund investments.
